adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version used for this response

status.description: Current task state - 'completed' for immediate success, 'working' for operations under 120s, 'submitted' for long-running operations, 'input-required' if approval needed

task_id.description: Unique identifier for tracking this async operation (present for submitted/working status)

media_buy_id.description: Publisher's identifier for the media buy

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy

implementation_date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when changes take effect (null if pending approval)

affected_packages.description: Array of packages that were modified

errors.description: Task-specific errors and warnings (e.g., partial update failures)
